org-tagline: Kurwira Kodzero, Kuvaka Ruzivo, Kugadzira Shanduko
hero-description: Albinism Foundation Zambia yakazvipira kurwira kodzero dzevanhu vane albinism, kukurudzira ruzivo, uye kuvaka nharaunda yakabatana uko munhu wese anogona kubudirira.
mission-statement: Kurwira kodzero, rukudzo, uye kubatanidzwa kwevanhu vane albinism muZambia kuburikidza nemishandirapamwe yekuzivisa, kurwira mutemo, masevhisi etsigiro, uye zvirongwa zvekusimbisa nharaunda.
focus-rights-desc: Kutsigira kushandurwa kwemitemo nekuchengetedzwa kwemutemo kuti tive nekodzero dzakafanana nemikana yevanhu vese vane albinism.
focus-awareness-desc: Kudzidzisa nharaunda nezve albinism kurwisa ngano, mafungiro asina chokwadi, uye rusarura kuburikidza nezvirongwa zvakananga.
focus-support-desc: Kupa masevhisi akakosha kusanganisira kugova sunscreen, mbatya dzinodzivira, uye kuronga kuwana hutano.
focus-education-desc: Kuona kuti vana vane albinism vane mukana wekuwana dzidzo yakanaka pamwe nekugadziriswa kwakakodzera uye masystem etsigiro.
news-1-title: AFZ Inotanga Mushandirapamwe Wekuzivisa Munyika Yese
news-1-excerpt: Mushandirapamwe wedu wakakwana wekuzivisa unosvika kunharaunda dzemumafuro muZambia kurwisa rusarura nekukurudzira kunzwisisa.
news-2-title: Kukunda Kwemutemo: Matanho Matsva Ekudzivirira Akabvumidzwa
news-2-excerpt: Hurumende inobvumidza matanho matsva emutemo ekudzivirira vanhu vane albinism kubva kumhirizhonga nerusarura.
news-3-excerpt: AFZ inowedzera zvirongwa zvetsigiro yedzidzo kusanganisira vadzidzi vane albinism mazana maviri vamwe pematunhu ese.
cta-description: Pamwe chete, tinogona kugadzira Zambia iyo vanhu vane albinism vanogara nerukudzo, kufanana, nemikana.
address: [Kero yeHofisi yeAFZ - Inofanira kutsiviwa nekero chaiyo]
awareness-description: Pamwe chete, tinoputsa runyararo uye tinoparadza mafungiro asina chokwadi nezve albinism.
awareness-stat-1-desc: Vanhu pasi rose vanoberekerwa ne albinism
